tril1 <- function(M, k = 0 ) {
  M[!lower.tri(M, diag = TRUE)] <- 0
  M[!upper.tri(M, diag = TRUE)] <- 0
  return(M)
}

matriz<- function(M){
  D<-cbind(diag(diag(M)))
  D
}

M = matrix(c( 1,  2,  3,
              4, 5,  6,
              7,  8, 9), nrow=3, byrow=TRUE)
#4,a
tril1(M,0)
#4,b
matriz(M)
